hero.title: Hi, I'm Pulkit!
hero.p1: Master's in Fintech and Business Analytics from
hero.des0: I am persuing masters in Fintech and am a grad from Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University with major in Computer Science.
hero.des1: I enjoy finance and also love creating high-quality software products with a complex logic behind it.
hero.des2: My technology stack includes Python, React, Angular, TypeScript and NodeJs.
hero.des3: I am also currently learning Machine Learning ,Data Science & Finance.

projects.description: Here are some of my most favourite projects that I enjoyed coding and designing from scratch, both with a team and alone.

hackinbits.description: A Platform for people to come up and learn coding skills and skill up themselves by solving questions and reading up short and concise articles on the topic.
